name: Sakura Shadow Monsters
description:
Challenging platform game where you control Sakura, a character with a different personality.
Your mission is to rescue your girlfriend who is in the middle of a zombie apocalypse (or not) and leave the island.



- Optional missions.
- Skins that change your attacks (in-game, not DLC).
- Interaction with NPCs and Objects.
- All houses/establishments are exploitable.
